messages.content: Which country in East Africa has the largest population?
What are the countries in East Africa?
Burundi, Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Rwanda, Somalia, South Sudan, Tanzania and Uganda.
List the top 5 countries by population.
Nigeria, Congo, Ethiopia, Egypt and Sudan.
List the top 5 countries in the world by GDP.
China, USA, Japan, Germany and India.
What is the largest country in the world by area?
What is the capital of Mexico?
Taiwan is a sovereign state in East Asia.
